title: The picture of a perfit common wealth describing aswell the offices of princes and inferiour magistrates ouer their subiects, as also the duties of subiects towards their gouernours. Gathered forth of many authors, aswel humane, as diuine, by Thomas Floyd master in the Artes.
author: Floyd, Thomas, M.A., of Jesus College, Oxford.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling on Adling hill,
